ygData.subject: Astral And His Crew, The Lavacons(LONG But Good!)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Admiral Astral and his crew of Lavacons aren t far from Earth now. Astral looks out the glass at the big blue Earth. Ah, we re almost there......... He

::The Lavacons::

         Admiral Astral and his crew of Lavacons aren't f=
ar from Earth now.  

      Astral looks out the glass at the big blue Eart=
h.

      "Ah, we're almost there........." He said, standing tall with his=
 hands behind his back.

         Fenox was Astral's best friend, and he wo=
uld never let him down.  Fenox was also Vice-Admiral, and he was liked just=
 as much, if not more.

       Fenox stood beside Astral, looking out.

   =
     "Yes.....We'll be there........We better be prepared for any enemies t=
hat may be on the planet.

        Astral turned to Starlight, who was at t=
he computer consoles.

       "Starlight, check the planet for any warfare =
going on," He said.

        Starlight nodded, "Yes, admiral, at your servi=
ce," She said, and started pressing buttons rapidly.

        Starlight loo=
ked at the admiral shamely, "Unfortunately, yes.....There is much warfare g=
oing on between many factions.  Right now, the three main factions are know=
n as the Maximals, Predacons and the Alliance.  It looks like we won't be a=
ble to finish this experiment without getting a few scratches."

          =
Fenox sighed.

       "Let's just hope everybody survives," He said.

     =
Astral nodded at Starlight, and then continued looking at Earth.

       "Y=
es, Fenox, let's hope that everybody does survive," He said.

       Then, =
Astral made tight fists with his hand.

       "We may even have to........=
.Get Recklessa to do her job," He said, with fear and anger in his voice.

=
     Meanwhile Griplash was in his lab, looking at some DNA specimens from =
the Earth's early animals.

        And then, at the back of the big ship, =
was Recklessa, the Lavacons most fearsome warrior.  She was the mass destro=
yer of the Lavacons, but, she isn't expecting to have to use her ability on=
 this "harmless" experiment.

        A couple hours passed by.  The ship w=
as now entering Earth's atmosphere.

      Astral sat in his chair at the f=
ront of the ship.  Fenox sat in his chair, awaiting their arrival on Earth.=
  Everyone was at the front, in their seats, jumpy about getting on Earth. =
 The ship suddenly began to go out of control as a cyclone was heading stra=
ight towards the ship.

      Astral and Fenox jumped out of their chairs i=
nstantly.

      "Shit!!!  Starlight, stear the ship out of that thing's pa=
th!!!!" Astral screamed.

     "Yes sir!!!  Come on stupid thing!!!!  Go, g=
o, goooo!!!!!" Starlight said, pounding everything in front of her.  Sudden=
ly, she went and turned the ship right off course of the cyclone's path.

 =
     The emergency alarm went off.  The ship was going down!!!!  Down!!!!!!=


     Astral yelled at Starlight, "Get this thing back up!!!!!  Now!!!!" H=
e said.

       It was too late.  

     The ship was far away from the cyc=
lone, but was now ready to impact on the ground.  

     The ship hit it, a=
nd went skidding forward, and then flipped twice.  The ship hit a gigantic =
boulder, and then the nose of the ship was scrunched up.

       Everyone w=
as flung all over the place during the crash, Fenox was shot straight out a=
nd was laying on the ground.  Starlight lay with her face on a control boar=
d.  Astral was thrown against Griplash, who was squished in between two com=
puter consoles.  Recklessa was also shot out, and was......Buried in coconu=
ts????  Hmmm......Palm trees????  Sunny weather???  Ah, yessss.........This=
 was.........The Bahamas!!!!  

         Fenox woke up, along with Reckless=
a and Griplash.

      "Oh man....I don't feel so........Oh man," He said, =
struggling to move his aching body.

      Recklessa grabbed a coconut and =
crushed it in her hand.

      "Talk about headaches," She said, rubbing he=
r poor, coconut bashed head.

       Griplash picked up Astral, and brought=
 him outside.

      "You two alright??  Where are we anyway??" He said, si=
tting Astral down and rubbing his shoulder.

          Fenox layed down on =
the ground, and said, "I think we're in the Bahamas.  Oh man, my whole body=
 aches like hell!!"

        Recklessa sat down beside Fenox.

       "My h=
ead feels like a pillow that's just been stuffed with a big rock," She said=
, leaning over on Fenox.

      Fenox edged away from Recklessa, and then h=
e got up.

      "Hey, how's Astral?  We better check him out," He said, ru=
nning over to Astral.

     Recklessa grumbled, and walked over to Astral.
=

     Griplash got up, and went over to Astral.

       "Hey, Admiral, you =
functioning???  Yoohoo, Admiral??" He said, waving his hand back and forth.=


     Fenox bent down by Astral, "Come on Astral, speak, speak!!" He said,=
 crossing his fingers.

       Astral slowly opened his eyes, and saw Gripl=
ash, Fenox and Recklessa.

     "I'm alive!!!!  Good!!!  Excellent!!!  Fant=
astic!!!  Fantabulous!!!!" He said, standing up and brushing himself off.

=
      "Ah, looks like we crashed in the Bahamas," He said, looking at the s=
urrounding.

        Everyone went and sat down by some trees, and talked. =
 

     Then, Griplash brought up, "Hey......Something's not right......We'=
re still missing something......" He said.

      Suddenly, everybody shout=
ed, "Starlight!!!!!!!!!!  We forgot all about her!!!!!!" And then, they all=
 ran back into the ship.  

      They took out Starlight, and brought her =
by the clearing of trees. 

       They let her rest, hoping she was still =
online.

    30 minutes passed, and Starlight finally recovered from the cr=
ash.

      "Did we make it??  Did everyone make it??" Was all she was able=
 to get out in a low mutter.

       Astral helped him up and patted her on=
 the shoulder.

      "Yep, we all made it.......But, unfortunately, we don=
't have a base.  We'll have to survive in the wilderness....Of the Bahamas!=
!!  Yes!!!!  We're stranded, but we're stranded on the Bahamas!!!!!  What a=
 great place to be stranded eh??" He said, smiling.

    Starlight sat down=
.

    "Ya, that's so great, I forgot to yell yippee," She said, groaning.
=

      They all sat down for a few hours, and then decided to get on with t=
he experiment.

          Griplash frowned.

       "This is just great, th=
e crash destroyed the DNA specimens.  Luckily, we brought our own DNA scann=
ers just in case," He said.

        They all scattered off in search of a =
beast mode.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
(I'm gonna do this =
individually)

::Astral::

      Astral was now 1 mile away from the place =
where everyone was going to meet back up.  He scoured the area, but found n=
othing.  He continued walking peacefully, enjoying the sun, until he trippe=
d on something.  He got back up, and saw the thing, it was, some kind of bo=
ne.  He began digging it up, and there it was, the remains of a dinosaur bi=
rd.

      Astral got out his DNA scanner thingy, and then began his stuff.=


        "Hmmm......A Pterodactyl.........Yes..........I wonder what this =
will look like?" He said, and took the beast mode of a Pterodactyl, with a =
few.....Hot differences.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Feno=
x::

        Fenox kept going south.  After a while, he saw a dead animal..=
.......A panther.......Hmmm, this might suit him.

          "Wait till tho=
se guys see me, I'll show them who's really a cool cat!!!!!  Make that, bur=
ning cat!!!" He said, and took the beast mode.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Starlight::

      Starlight was having tons of luck find=
ing animals for beast modes, but she just couldn't find the right one.  She=
 kept walking along and eventually decided to take a rest.  While she dozed=
 off, a wasp came and landed on her hand.  She dropped the DNA scanner thin=
gy, and it activated itself, and took the form of a wasp as a beast mode, e=
xcept fiery.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Griplash::

    =
    Griplash strolled along through a shady area.  As he was walking, a sna=
ke came slithering up his leg.

     Griplash picked it up, "Hey there litt=
le buddy, how's it going?" He said, nicely.

     Griplash sat, holding the=
 snake, and talking to it about the crash and all.  Then, Griplash finally =
came to the conclusion that he liked snakes.

     "You know little buddy, =
I think I'll make you my beast mode, " He said and used the DNA scanner thi=
ngy.  Now, Griplash was a Lava snake.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~
::Recklessa::

       Recklessa didn't like this at all.  There was =
no animals on this place!!!!!  She decided to do a little fancy work.  She =
took off with her thrusters and went at full speed.  She saw a group of big=
, strong animals.  She saw that they were elephants.  Strength, they had.  =
Speed, that was a whole different story.  She liked it.  She used the DNA s=
canner and took the beast mode of an elephant and turned it into a big, wal=
king fireball.  
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
(Back At The G=
rove)

        Astral was the first to arrive back at the meeting place.  F=
enox and Griplash came back at nearly the same time.  Starlight was third, =
and Recklessa came back last, since she was the farthest.

      All of the=
m looked at eachother, eager to see one another's beast modes.

      They =
all formed a circle, and then Griplash spoke, "Ok, fellow Lavacons, on the =
count of 3, we go beast mode!!" He said.

      "1!"

      "2!"

       "3=
!!!"

   They all yelled together, "Beast mode!!!"

     They all looked at=
 each other.  Recklessa was dazzled at Fenox's beast mode.  They all liked =
Fenox's beast mode, actually.  Astral's beast mode was astonishing too.  Gr=
iplash's snake beast mode fitted him good, and Starlight's beast mode was a=
ccidental, but still ok.  Recklessa's beast mode was the real jawdropper.

=
      "What??  An elephant on the Bahamas??!!  Ok, I must be dreaming!" Sta=
rlight said, staring at Recklessa.  They all stared at Recklessa, with puzz=
led looks.

      Recklessa let out a loud warning with her trunk.

      "=
Hey, animals are unpredictable these days eh?" She said.

     They were al=
l animals, excpet either made up of fire or lava.  It got dark soon, so the=
y all went to sleep at the spot of trees.  For safety, they had night shift=
s for gaurding.

(OOC: How was THAT for an intro/arrival???  Really folks, =
I have to admit, that was one of the best yet!)
